#summary MultiAdaptor for SOIC SSOP TSSOP MSOP SOT23 SOT223 SOT143 SC70

This board is still under development.

The relevant [http://www.lis.inpg.fr/realise_au_lis/kicad/ KiCAD] design files can be found through [http://code.google.com/p/micropendous/source/checkout SVN] in the `/Current_Designs/MultiAdaptor/` directory.

This adaptor has multiple overlapping footprints for any occasion: up to 28 pin SOIC (1.27mm pitch), up to 28-pin SSOP (0.65mm pitch), up to four SOT23, up to three SC70, one MSOP-10 (0.5mm pitch), one SOT223, and one SOT-143.  All in a 0.8" wide DIP board.

PCBs of these designs can be purchased at cost through [http://www.batchpcb.com BatchPCB]:: [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44119 Audio Amplifier Board], [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44231 Regulators Board]
